extendedInfo.description: Download the Youtube App on your PS3 and control your music and videos right from your phone!-Search: Finding the videos you want is easier than ever, with search suggestions and instant video results while you type.-Your subscribed channels: Sign in to find the latest videos from your YouTube subscriptions, which now also includes official music videos.-Your phone as a remote: With a quick pairing process, you can control YouTube on the Playstation 3 with a smartphone. Find a video on your phone and with a button itâll play on the big screen. While the video is playing you can control it from the phone, or keep browsing YouTube for the next one.

reviews.title: It\'s the mobile website
reviews.comment: And you made the app go to the connect page. It\'s even gayer cause I couldn\'t play a video on my PS3. The web browser is better. This is just a waste of yo mommas space nigguh
reviews.author: Kaimana Dasigo

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: It does what it is suppose to do, but with one crucial flaw....it doesn\'t remember you personal TV. Every time you come back to the app you have to pair with your TV. This becomes very tedious. I deleted after one nights use.
reviews.author: Jay H.

reviews.title: Useless!
reviews.comment: PS3 already gap a pairing option and you don\'t need to download anything to be able to control  YouTube from your android phone!
reviews.author: George Paraskeva

reviews.title: Poor quality app
reviews.comment: The app never stays connected for more than 30s or so.  Also the search functionality never saves your searches.
reviews.author: Tony Emond

reviews.title: OK
reviews.comment: Great app but needs to save you paired device. Always have to reinter paring number.
reviews.author: Brad Hatfield

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Its better than the old way and its faster and u get to control better than stupid xbox
reviews.author: bestplayer loos

reviews.title: problems
reviews.comment: it works great for a bit. after ten minutes it stops and says protocal not supported. It works again if you unpair the devices and pair them again. you have to keep doing. pain in the butt. please fix. otherwise great app. I have galaxy s 3.
reviews.author: George Young

reviews.title: Not sure how to connect to my PS3
reviews.comment: So far it\'s looking for a TV, not my PS3. Not sure how this works because I do not have a wifi enabled TV.  Nothing anywhere on my PS3 is detecting a controller.  I even updated the PS3 YouTube App but it doesn\'t seem to have any settings to find this app on my phone.
reviews.author: Charley B

reviews.title: Potential
reviews.comment: Very unstable. Have to re-pair after every video i watch. Not practical for use in its current form. Faster to just use the ps3 controller.  Fix the pair problems and it\'s 5 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: That sucks
reviews.comment: It always disconnect me. I think that it is going to be a great app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I can\'t believe you let that first comment on here where the reviewer called the app gayer. Really? In 2013?
reviews.author: frank wallace

reviews.title: Very annoying
reviews.comment: The main problem with this app is that it keeps on disconnecting.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Stupid
reviews.comment: You would think even the developers of this application would believe having to pair/sync the two devices every single usage is stupid!!! Need to update soon or I\'m installing.
reviews.author: Kenyon Johnson

reviews.title: Bad coding?
reviews.comment: Probabable cause of reboot loop when watching youtube videos.
reviews.author: Frank Green

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: On load up of the program is says protocol not supported by my Samsung Galaxy Note.
reviews.author: Jereme Wagman

reviews.title: Doesn\'t stay linked
reviews.comment: I have to keep pairing to my phone constantly. No use.
reviews.author: sam baca

reviews.title: Revew by Ebrahim Hamza
reviews.comment: Live me always  Excellently
reviews.author: Ebrahim Hamza

reviews.title: nice
reviews.comment: on life...it would be 10x better if it stop disconnecting me
reviews.author: rahmere dunn

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: Agree with everyone else will not stay connected :(
reviews.author: gemma Louise

reviews.title: Thumbs up
reviews.comment: Excellent
reviews.author: Patrick Dunbar
